q: German archaeologist Ludwig Borchhardt found the statute in 1912 and it was taken to Germany in 1913. In the past, Zahi Hawass has sent letters to try and get he statue back to Egypt. I am doing something that I believe in and that should have been done a 100 years ago, Zahi Hawass told AP.`` My campaign has united those who have been pillaged against the pillagers. It's the world's greatest campaign of its kind and has inspired many nations to follow suit.''

Your Own Boss in 12 Months.`` You have to figure out whether your ego can take Sergey Bringing another person to the table who's really making decisions that affect your business,'' Eric Schmidt says. Not only do you have to have clearly defined roles for you and your new manager, but you have to make sure those roles are clear to everyone at your company. You don't want employees pitting you and the new manager against each other, or coming to you in hopes of getting a different answer than what they heard from the new executive. It

Veteran Indiana Congressman Mike Pence said: Any increase in the debt ceiling should be married to very real and significant reductions in spending in the short term and the long term.
